  - 20-30k flies
- Capture from east (and west as control) 
  - 24 hrs later
  - 50-300 flies
- Phenotypes of F2

## Results: Dispersal Assay

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="70%"}

![](Figures/Dispersal/dispersalplot.png)

:::


::: {.column width="3%"} 

:::

::: {.column width="27%"}

::: {style="font-size: 24pt"}

- H~A~: F1 progeny of the flies, dispersed in the experiment, are more likely to disperse than the ones did not disperse in the experiment. 
- Cochran-Mantel-Haenszel Chi-Square test p=1.59x10^-5^

:::
